verbose_text: Hoefer et al demonstrated that ICAM-1-mediated monocyte adhesion via ICAM-1 / Mac-1 interaction to the endothelium of collateral arteries is essential in these processes by treating in vivo subjects with monoclonal antibodies against ICAM-1, which totally abolished the stimulatory effect of MCP-1 on collateral artery growth.
evidence: ICAM-1, which totally abolished the stimulatory effect of MCP-1
